products.title: Rio Blackout Solar Vanilla Neat Fit Honeycomb Pleated Blind
products.description: Rio blackout solar is a honeycomb blackout pleated fabric, available in a wide range of tropical colours with an added bonus of a solar silver backing to block harmful uv rays. This soft almost magnolia cream shade, can be paired with any coloured accessories for a summery vibe, or cream walls for a warmer feel. Raio vanilla is a great addition to a kitchen or conervatory with plants to help dress the room.

products.title: Rio Blackout Solar Eclipse Neat Fit Honeycomb Pleated Blind
products.description: Rio blackout solar is a honeycomb blackout pleated fabric, available in a wide range of tropical colours with an added bonus of a solar silver backing to block harmful uv rays. Rio eclipse is a dark to medium to dark blue shade. This fabric colour goes great with wooden furnishings with its strong blue tone. Product id: db-nfpl0041 fabric colour: eclipse material: 100% polyester lining: reflective blackout silver backing - uv blocking headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.
